participant_1.background:
My daily routine consists of working from home as a digital artist and spending weekends with my girlfriend in Salt Lake City.
I enjoy driving my classic car along the winding roads near my lake house.
I'm happy about my new sweater, but I'm also disappointed about not getting into the gifted program.
I think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk.
i helped develop facebook.

participant_2.background:
I like to eat the food that my grandmother taught me to cook.
I have no siblings, but I'm hoping to learn some new tricks to teach my dog so we can have more adventures together!
My husband and I live on the outskirts of the city so we can afford a large home, but we still have access to all the city amenities.
i eat mainly chinese food.
I've been told my steaks are to die for.

content.text: Hey! Not much, just working on my computer. What are you up to?
I'm working from home as a digital artist.
That's awesome! I'm an artist too, but I'm self-taught.
That's great! I love seeing other people's art.
Thanks! I'm really into painting and drawing, but I've been wanting to learn how to do digital art.
It's really fun! I use a drawing tablet and software to create my art.
That sounds really cool! I'll have to look into it.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to express yourself.
No problem! What kind of art do you like to create?
I like to paint landscapes and portraits. I also like to do some abstract pieces.
Those sound really cool! I'd love to see some of your work sometime.
Sure! I'll send you some links.
